analyzed: de la rang gi don ni phyogs kyi chos nyid du mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las ldog pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi tshul gsum pa'i rtags las rjes su dpag par bya ba'i don gyi yul can gyi shes pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: Among them, oneâ€™s own purpose is the cognition of the object of inference, which is the subject, from a sign having the trimodal characteristic, i.e., existence in the similar class and the absence of that in the dissimilar class, by the method of the property of the subject.

original: de'i bdag nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be known to be of that nature.

original: gzhan gyi don ni ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gsum pa'i rtags gsal bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don ni ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gsum pa'i rtags gsal bar byed pa ste /
translated: The purpose of others is the clarification of the trimodal sign as it has been explained.

original: tshig gi bdag nyid du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshig gi bdag nyid du blta bar bya'o //
translated: It should be viewed as having the nature of words.

original: yang na rjes su dpag pa ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ma bstan pas /
analyzed: yang na rjes su dpag pa ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ma bstan pas /
translated: Or else, since the definition of an apparent inference has not been taught,

original: de'i phyir tshul re re zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshul re re zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: therefore he says, â€œeach of the three modes,â€ and so on.

original: sgra rtag ces byas pa'i phyir lus can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra rtag ces byas pa'i phyir lus can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: For example, â€œSound is permanent because it is corporeal.â€

original: gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba tshul re re ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba tshul re re ba yin te /
translated: The reason â€œbecause it is an object of comprehensionâ€ is each of the three modes,

original: go rims bzhin du phyogs kyi chos nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang nyid dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa tsam yod pa'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½de la tshul gnyis pa ni sgra mi rtag ste /
analyzed: go rims bzhin du phyogs kyi chos nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang nyid dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa tsam yod pa'i phyir ro // de la tshul gnyis pa ni sgra mi rtag ste /
translated: because it exists in the similar class and because it merely does not occur in the dissimilar class, respectively.

original: mig gis gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mig gis gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The second mode is like â€œSound is impermanent because it is apprehended by the eye.â€ğŸ”½Because it exists in the similar class and because it merely does not occur in the dissimilar class, respectively.

original: mnyan par bya ba yin pa'i phyir lus can ma @24b yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba yin pa'i phyir lus can ma @24b yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
translated: The third mode is like â€œSound is impermanent because it is produced.â€

original: go rims bzhin du phyogs kyi chos nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa tsam med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du phyogs kyi chos nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa tsam med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it exists in the similar class and because it merely does not occur in the dissimilar class, respectively.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: It is said:

original: sgra ni rtag ste byas pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sgra ni rtag ste byas pa'i phyir //
translated: Sound is permanent because it is produced.

original: lus can gzhal bya ma yin phyir //
analyzed: lus can gzhal bya ma yin phyir //
translated: A body is not an object of comprehension.

original: mi rtag mig gis gzung bya'i phyir //
analyzed: mi rtag mig gis gzung bya'i phyir //
translated: Impermanent things are apprehended by the eye.

original: lus can ma yin mnyan bya'i phyir //ğŸ”½zhes bshad do //
analyzed: lus can ma yin mnyan bya'i phyir //ğŸ”½zhes bshad do //
translated: A non-body is heard.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba la sogs pas snod kyi rje'i lugs kyi dogs pa bsu ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba la sogs pas snod kyi rje'i lugs kyi dogs pa bsu ba yin te /
translated: The opponentâ€™s objection is stated by â€œOtherwise . . . â€ and so on.

original: des smras pa /
analyzed: des smras pa /
translated: He says:

original: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid gtan tshigs bzang po yin gyi mtshan nyid gsum pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid gtan tshigs bzang po yin gyi mtshan nyid gsum pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Otherwise, that is, if the reason is not established as absent in a dissimilar instance, it is a good reason, but it does not have the three characteristics.

original: 'di ltar gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid med na de'i bu nyid la sogs pa yan lag gsum pa can gtan tshigs bzang por ma mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid med na de'i bu nyid la sogs pa yan lag gsum pa can gtan tshigs bzang por ma mthong ste /
translated: For if the reason is not established as absent in a dissimilar instance, then the three-part reason, such as â€œbecause of being its son,â€ is not seen to be a good reason.

original: de lta bas na mtshan nyid gsum pa can gyi gtan tshigs ni don med pa ste nus pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na mtshan nyid gsum pa can gyi gtan tshigs ni don med pa ste nus pa med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, a reason having the three characteristics is pointless, that is, it is not a good reason.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ste /
translated: â€œ Otherwiseâ€ means

original: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya med na mi 'thad pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya med na mi 'thad pa ste /
translated: that the reason is not established as absent in a dissimilar instance.

original: bsgrub bya kho na la yod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub bya kho na la yod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it exists only in the similar instance.

original: gang la gzhan du mi 'thad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyas par rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par bstan pa'i sgo nas gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ces bya ba'i gtan tshigs mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid du sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: gang la gzhan du mi 'thad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyas par rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par bstan pa'i sgo nas gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ces bya ba'i gtan tshigs mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid du sgrub par byed do //
translated: The term â€œinadmissibility elsewhereâ€ and so on indicates that the reason â€œinadmissibility elsewhereâ€ proves the identity of the characteristic of the reason.

original: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid gcig gang la yod pa de ni mtshan nyid gcig ste /
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid gcig gang la yod pa de ni mtshan nyid gcig ste /
translated: That which has the characteristic of inadmissibility elsewhere has a single characteristic.

original: de nyid 'jig rten pa'am yongs su rtogs pa po rnams kyis gtan tshigs su 'dod kyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid 'jig rten pa'am yongs su rtogs pa po rnams kyis gtan tshigs su 'dod kyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: This is asserted by the world or by the logicians to be the reason, but not any other.

original: shugs kyis phyogs kyi chos nyid la sogs pa gsum po 'di nyid kyis 'phen pa'i phyir mtshan nyid bzhi ba yang yin la rag pa'am yang mtshan nyid bzhi pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: shugs kyis phyogs kyi chos nyid la sogs pa gsum po 'di nyid kyis 'phen pa'i phyir mtshan nyid bzhi ba yang yin la rag pa'am yang mtshan nyid bzhi pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Since the threeâ€”the property of the subject and so onâ€”are implied by the force of this, there is no need for a fourth characteristic.

original: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig tu mtshan nyid gcig pa can dang / mtshan nyid gnyis pa'am /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig tu mtshan nyid gcig pa can dang / mtshan nyid gnyis pa'am /
translated: Or, there is no fourth characteristic, because it is possible that something has a single characteristic, two characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid gsum par yang rigs te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gsum par yang rigs te /
translated: or three characteristics.

original: 'di ltar gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid gcig po des mtshan nyid gcig ces bstan la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid gcig po des mtshan nyid gcig ces bstan la /
translated: Thus, by the very characteristic of not being tenable in any other way, it is taught that there is one characteristic.

original: gzhan du mi 'thad pa dang lhan cig pa'i rigs mthun pa la grub pa dang rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa mngon par dpyad nas mtshan nyid gnyis pa'o //ğŸ”½gnyi ga gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid dang rigs mthun pa la 'jug pa nyid dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs @25a * //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pa dang lhan cig pa'i rigs mthun pa la grub pa dang rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa mngon par dpyad nas mtshan nyid gnyis pa'o // gnyi ga gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid dang rigs mthun pa la 'jug pa nyid dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs @25a * //
translated: The second characteristic is established by the analysis of the similarity of not being tenable in any other way and the difference of being the opposite of that which is dissimilar.

original: las ldog pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid gsum pa yin gyi //ğŸ”½phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pas ni /ğŸ”½gtan tshigs mtshan nyid gsum du mi 'dod de /
analyzed: las ldog pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid gsum pa yin gyi // phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pas ni / gtan tshigs mtshan nyid gsum du mi 'dod de /
translated: The third characteristic is the non-tenability in any other way, the engagement in that which is similar, and the difference of the probandum from that which is dissimilar.

original: de dag ni yang dag pa'i shes pa lam nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni yang dag pa'i shes pa lam nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: However, the reason is not accepted as having three characteristics, such as the property of the subject, because those are not tenable as the path of right knowledge.

original: rnam pa gcig tu na gtso bo yin pa'i phyir gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ces bya bas mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid du bstan gyi phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu na gtso bo yin pa'i phyir gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ces bya bas mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid du bstan gyi phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: In one sense, it is called â€œnon-erroneousâ€ because it is the principal characteristic, and it is not tenable as anything else.

original: de dag ni gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: de dag ni gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir ram /
translated: It is not the property of the subject, etc., because those are not the principal characteristics.

original: cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Or, because they do not perform any function at all.

original: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: In order to demonstrate this, he says, â€œFor example,â€ and so on.

original: 'on te med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel ba yod pa'i phyir tshul gsum pa nyid gtan tshigs bzang por rigs pa ma yin nam zhe na /

original: thun mong ba nyid du bshad do //
analyzed: thun mong ba nyid du bshad do //
translated: He explains that the reason is common to both the proponent and the opponent.

original: gtan tshigs gsum pa la yang sbrang bu 'di yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gsum pa la yang sbrang bu 'di yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: With regard to the third reason, he says, â€œThis fly . . . â€ and so on.

original: khyad par ma thong ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs dang dam bca' dag ste /
analyzed: khyad par ma thong ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs dang dam bca' dag ste /
translated: â€œIt is not that the reason and the thesis are not statedâ€ means that the reason and the thesis are stated.

analyzed: dam bca' ba ni don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The thesis is a part of the meaning of the reason.

original: 'di ltar 'dir @28b nyams su myong ba'i rgyu khyad par can gyi sbrang bu bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa de nyid sgra gzhan gyis gtan tshigs nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dir @28b nyams su myong ba'i rgyu khyad par can gyi sbrang bu bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa de nyid sgra gzhan gyis gtan tshigs nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, here, the very thing that is asserted to be the probandum, the special cause of the experience of the bee, is indicated as the reason by another word.

original: gtan tshigs dang dam bca' ba dag khyad par med do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dam bca' ba dag khyad par med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no difference between the reason and the thesis.

original: gang gi tshe babs pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par mi len gyi skye ba thob pa'i phyir zhes bya ba spyir gtan tshigs su brjod pa de'i tshe dam bca' ba'i phyogs gcig pa ma yin no zhes ba bar 'dod na 'di la babs pa zhes bya ba la
analyzed: gang gi tshe babs pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par mi len gyi skye ba thob pa'i phyir zhes bya ba spyir gtan tshigs su brjod pa de'i tshe dam bca' ba'i phyogs gcig pa ma yin no zhes ba bar 'dod na 'di la babs pa zhes bya ba la
translated: If you assert that when the word â€œdescentâ€ is not taken as a qualifier, but the general reason â€œbecause of obtaining birthâ€ is stated, then the thesis is not a part of the reason, then in response to that, BhÄviveka says, â€œIn that case, the word â€˜descentâ€™ . . . â€

original: sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so on.

original: sbrang bu gzhan gyis byas pa'i tshor bas 'khrul par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir gdon mi za bar khyad par bya dgos so //
analyzed: sbrang bu gzhan gyis byas pa'i tshor bas 'khrul par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir gdon mi za bar khyad par bya dgos so //
translated: Because it would be possible for the feeling produced by another bee to be mistaken, it is definitely necessary to add a qualifier.

original: ci ste rgyu dang 'bras bu tha snyad brjod pa de la bsgrub pa de ltar yin na gtan tshigs tshul gsum par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste rgyu dang 'bras bu tha snyad brjod pa de la bsgrub pa de ltar yin na gtan tshigs tshul gsum par 'gyur te /
translated: If the proof is like that, in the case of the expression of cause and effect, the reason would be the three modes.

analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bur rab tu grags pa'i me dang du ba la sogs pa dpe nyid du yod pa'i phyir ro // mig ni gzugs 'dzin bya ba la //
translated: Because the example of fire and smoke, which are well known as cause and effect, exists.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa la /ğŸ”½chos can rang bzhin mig la ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa la / chos can rang bzhin mig la ni //
translated: As for what was said, â€œThe eye is for the purpose of apprehending form,â€

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it is said, â€œThe eye, which is the subject and nature,â€ and so on.

original: de ni sgrub byed nyid mi rigs zhes bya bar gcod do //
analyzed: de ni sgrub byed nyid mi rigs zhes bya bar gcod do //
translated: It is concluded that it is not reasonable as the probandum.

analyzed: ma grub pa la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras 'khrul pa dang 'gal ba bdag gzung ngo //
translated: As for â€œunproven,â€ and so on, the term â€œand so onâ€ includes error and contradiction.

original: yod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin na gtan tshigs thams cad skyon gyi rigs gsum las mi 'da' ste /
analyzed: yod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin na gtan tshigs thams cad skyon gyi rigs gsum las mi 'da' ste /

analyzed: 'di ltar yod pa'i chos gzhan gtan tshigs yin nam ma grub la /

analyzed: med pa'i chos yin na 'gal ba nyid yin te /
translated: If it is a nonexistent phenomenon, then it is contradictory.

original: ji skad du /ğŸ”½ma grub pa la yod chos med //
analyzed: ji skad du / ma grub pa la yod chos med //
translated: As it is said:ğŸ”½A nonexistent phenomenon has no property.

original: gnyi ga la brten 'khrul pa dang // med pa'i chos ni 'gal yin na //ğŸ”½ji ltar yod de bsgrub bya yin //
analyzed: gnyi ga la brten 'khrul pa dang // med pa'i chos ni 'gal yin na // ji ltar yod de bsgrub bya yin //
translated: If a nonexistent phenomenon is contradictory,

analyzed: zhes bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: how can it be the probandum?

original: ci ste chos can mig la mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de'i tshe yang nus pa dang yod pa la sogs pa rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ci ste chos can mig la mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de'i tshe yang nus pa dang yod pa la sogs pa rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If the eye, the subject, is being established as having the capacity to generate the eye consciousness, then since capacity and existence are synonyms,

original: de bsgrub pa na yod pa bsgrub par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bsgrub pa na yod pa bsgrub par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: it follows that existence is being established.

original: tha dad na yang de ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyis ma grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs gzhi ma grub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad na yang de ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyis ma grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs gzhi ma grub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are different, then since that capacity is beyond the senses, the reason is not established, and so the reason is not established.

original: de ltar na gzugs 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs chos med pa'i phyir ma grub par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs chos med pa'i phyir ma grub par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, â€œbecause it apprehends formâ€ should be regarded as unestablished because the property of the subject is not established.

original: 'o na ji khyed cag la yang mi la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /ğŸ”½'on @29a * //
analyzed: 'o na ji khyed cag la yang mi la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur zhe na / 'on @29a * //
translated: Well, then, do you also establish that a person and so on exist?

original: kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, â€œHowever,â€ and so on.

original: res 'ga' zhes bya ba ni mig btsums ba'i gnas skabs na'o //
analyzed: res 'ga' zhes bya ba ni mig btsums ba'i gnas skabs na'o //
translated: Sometimes means in the state of closed eyes.

original: kho bo cag gi dngos su mig la sogs pa 'di lta bu zhig go zhes grub pa ni ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: kho bo cag gi dngos su mig la sogs pa 'di lta bu zhig go zhes grub pa ni ma yin mod kyi /

original: 'on kyang shes pa gzugs la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed par mthong ba de ni rgyu gzhan la ltos pa dang de tsam gyis mi 'byung bar bsgrub par bya ba yin pas shes pa de nyid chos can yin
analyzed: 'on kyang shes pa gzugs la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed par mthong ba de ni rgyu gzhan la ltos pa dang de tsam gyis mi 'byung bar bsgrub par bya ba yin pas shes pa de nyid chos can yin
translated: However, we see that consciousness conforms to the presence or absence of some object such as form. That is established as not occurring by the mere presence of that object, but as dependent on another cause. Therefore, that consciousness is the subject.

original: pa'i phyir ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon med do //
analyzed: pa'i phyir ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon med do //
translated: Since it is established, there is no fault of nonestablishment and so on.

original: grub pa'i mtha' la brten na ni tha snyad tha dad do //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' la brten na ni tha snyad tha dad do //
translated: If one relies on the philosophical tenet systems, the designations are different.

original: 'di snyam du /
analyzed: 'di snyam du /
translated: One might think as follows:

analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis rnam par shes pa'i chos can yin du chug mod de lta na yang gtan tshigs tshul gnyis pa nyid do snyam du sems na / de la dpe ni rang rgyu las //
translated: One might think: â€œGranted that consciousness is the subject, in the manner explained, still, the second mode of the reason is not established.â€

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The example is â€œfrom its own cause.â€

original: rang gi rgyu las des pa ste rang gi rgyu dang 'brel par 'byung ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu las des pa ste rang gi rgyu dang 'brel par 'byung ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: That which is produced from its own cause, that which arises in relation to its own cause, is called â€œfrom its own cause.â€

original: de lta bur gyur ba'i rang gi rgyu la rag las pa'i skye ba can myu gu la sogs pa res 'ga' ba dpe nyid du yod do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur ba'i rang gi rgyu la rag las pa'i skye ba can myu gu la sogs pa res 'ga' ba dpe nyid du yod do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The example is that which has such a nature, that is, the arising that depends on its own cause, such as a sprout, which is intermittent.

original: sbyor ba yang 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba yang 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The syllogism is to be formulated as follows:

analyzed: gang dag gang nyen yang res 'ga' ba yin pa de dag ni de tsam gyis 'byung ba ma yin pa dang rgyu gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: Whatever is intermittent is not produced by that alone, but depends on other causes,

original: dper na nas la sogs pa yod na yang sa bon nye ba dang mi nye ba dag las rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa can gyi myu gu la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nas la sogs pa yod na yang sa bon nye ba dang mi nye ba dag las rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa can gyi myu gu la sogs pa bzhin no //

original: gzugs la sogs pa yod na yang btsums pa dang ma btsums pa'i gnas skabs na mig gi rnam par shes pa res 'ga' ba yin no zhes bya ba ni dgag pa la khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa yod na yang btsums pa dang ma btsums pa'i gnas skabs na mig gi rnam par shes pa res 'ga' ba yin no zhes bya ba ni dgag pa la khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Even though form, etc. exist, the visual consciousness is sometimes absent, as in the case of one who is not looking, and sometimes present, as in the case of one who is looking. This is the observation of a contradiction with a pervasion in a negation.

original: bsgrub pa la ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: bsgrub pa la ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: In an affirmation, it is an autonomous reason.

original: yang na / bdag dang bum pa la sogs pa //
analyzed: yang na / bdag dang bum pa la sogs pa //
translated: Or, in the case of the statement, â€œThe self, the pot, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bum pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba smos te /

translated: are not perceived by the eye sense faculty,â€ the word â€œetc.â€ refers to the pot, etc.

original: 'dir yang grub pa la bsgrub pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang grub pa la bsgrub pa nyid yin te /
translated: Here, too, it is an affirmation of what is already established,

analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis med pa nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the non-existence of the pot, etc. is already established in some way.

original: 'on te ma grub na mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di yang ma grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub po zhes ji ltar yod pa'i bdag nyid du bsgrub pa'i @29b gtan tshigs la smras pa sun 'byin pa snga ma bzhin du brjod parğŸ”½bya'o // mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te ma grub na mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di yang ma grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub po zhes ji ltar yod pa'i bdag nyid du bsgrub pa'i @29b gtan tshigs la smras pa sun 'byin pa snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o // mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa'i phyir /
translated: But if it is not established, then this reason â€œbecause of non-observationâ€ is not established, so how can it be a reason that establishes the existence of a self?ğŸ”½The refutation should be stated as before.

original: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe med do zhes gang smras pa /
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe med do zhes gang smras pa /
translated: As for the statement, â€œBecause there is no discordant side, there is no example that is discordant,â€

original: 'di la yang chos mi mthun pa'i dpe zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'di la yang chos mi mthun pa'i dpe zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: in response to that, the root text states, â€œIn this regard, there is no example that is discordant,â€ and so on.

original: gang gi tshe ngo bo gang gis bum pa la sogs pa dmigs pa'i ngo bo des de dag yod pa'i bdag nyid du 'dod pa de'i tshe de dag gi rang bzhin chos mi mthun pa'i dpe nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe ngo bo gang gis bum pa la sogs pa dmigs pa'i ngo bo des de dag yod pa'i bdag nyid du 'dod pa de'i tshe de dag gi rang bzhin chos mi mthun pa'i dpe nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: When the entity by which a vase and so on is observed is asserted to be the entity of its existence, then that nature of those things would be an example that is discordant.

original: rang bzhin de la mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin de la mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the reason of non-observation of that nature is reversed.

original: de bzhin du ji ltar yang zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di la yang 'dod pa grub pa la sogs pa mtshungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du ji ltar yang zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di la yang 'dod pa grub pa la sogs pa mtshungs so //
translated: Similarly, the application of â€œjust asâ€ and so on is established as desired.

original: bdag med dag la zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa dag la'o //
analyzed: bdag med dag la zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa dag la'o //
translated: â€œIn the absence of selfâ€ means in the absence of things.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin chos mi mthun pa srid pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin chos mi mthun pa srid pas so //
translated: â€œJust asâ€ means that it is possible that the property-possessor and the property are not similar.

original: chos mi mthun la 'thob ces bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa ste bsgrub bya ldog pa'i mtshan nyid la bsgrub bya med pas kyang khyab po //
analyzed: chos mi mthun la 'thob ces bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa ste bsgrub bya ldog pa'i mtshan nyid la bsgrub bya med pas kyang khyab po //
translated: â€œObtained in the dissimilarâ€ means that the dissimilar is characterized by the reversal of the probandum, and the absence of the probandum is pervaded by the absence of the property.

original: khyod kyi pha 'di khyim 'di na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: khyod kyi pha 'di khyim 'di na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: â€œThis father of yours is in this houseâ€ and so on.

original: pha'i skad ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: pha'i skad ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: â€œThe fatherâ€™s voiceâ€ and so on.

original: de zhes bya ba ni pha dang 'brel pa ste yul phyogs gzhan 'ga' zhig tu nyams su myong ba na gtan tshigs ma grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni pha dang 'brel pa ste yul phyogs gzhan 'ga' zhig tu nyams su myong ba na gtan tshigs ma grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: â€œThatâ€ refers to the connection with the father. If it is experienced in some other place, the reason would not be established.

original: gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshul gsum pa de nyid ston pa yin te /
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshul gsum pa de nyid ston pa yin te /
translated: â€œWhereâ€ and so on teaches just that trimodal condition.

original: sgra phyi rol gyi don la ltos nas gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ma grub pa'i phyir de la rtags nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra phyi rol gyi don la ltos nas gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ma grub pa'i phyir de la rtags nyid ma yin te /
translated: Because it is not established that it is not tenable for sound to be different in reliance on external objects, it is not a reason for that.

original: de ni 'dod pa tsam gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'dod pa tsam gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is engaged by mere desire.

original: ji ste blo la gnas pa'i don la ltos nas yin na /
analyzed: ji ste blo la gnas pa'i don la ltos nas yin na /
translated: But if it is in reliance on an object that exists in the mind,

original: de'i tshe du ba bzhin du tshul gsum pa nyid yod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe du ba bzhin du tshul gsum pa nyid yod pa kho na ste /
translated: then, like smoke, it has the three modes.

original: gang gi phyir brjod par 'dod pa mngon sum du ma gyur na sgra mi sbyor ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir brjod par 'dod pa mngon sum du ma gyur na sgra mi sbyor ba'i phyir /

analyzed: de'i 'bras bu yin pas du ba dang me bzhin du go bar byed pa 'dod kyi /
translated: Because it is its effect, like smoke and fire, it is asserted to be an indicator.

original: rjod par byed pa'i ngo bos ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa'i ngo bos ni ma yin no //
translated: But not by the nature of an expression.

original: sgron ma ni du ba bzhin du rtags kyi sgo nas shes par byed mi 'dod do //
analyzed: sgron ma ni du ba bzhin du rtags kyi sgo nas shes par byed mi 'dod do //
translated: A lamp is not asserted to be an indicator that makes known by the method of smoke.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: bum pa la sogs pa mig gi rnam par shes pa bskyed par rung bar skyed par shes par byed pa grags kyi rtags nyid ni ma yin pa'i phyir rtags su ma gyur pa de'i phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa bsam par mi rigs te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa mig gi rnam par shes pa bskyed par rung bar skyed par shes par byed pa grags kyi rtags nyid ni ma yin pa'i phyir rtags su ma gyur pa de'i phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa bsam par mi rigs te /
translated: Because the reason is well known to produce the eye consciousness that is suitable to produce such things as a pot, it is not a reason. It is not reasonable to consider the property of that position, etc., as a reason.

analyzed: gzhan du na mig la sogs pa rnams la yang brtsad par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, one would also have to dispute the eyes, etc.

original: gzhan du mi 'thad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni skabs kyi don @30a * //ğŸ”½mjug sdud par byed pa yin no //ğŸ”½gang gi phyir mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid mi rtag pa med na mi 'byung ba yin na yang sgra la de mi rtag pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //ğŸ”½gang gi phyir gdon mi za bar thams cad du phyogs kyi chos la brten par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni skabs kyi don @30a * // mjug sdud par byed pa yin no // gang gi phyir mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid mi rtag pa med na mi 'byung ba yin na yang sgra la de mi rtag pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin no // gang gi phyir gdon mi za bar thams cad du phyogs kyi chos la brten par bya ba yin no //
translated: The phrase â€œotherwise it is not tenableâ€ and so on is a conclusion that summarizes the point.ğŸ”½Because impermanence is not a reason that proves sound is impermanent, even though impermanence is the property of the subject of sound and is the property of the subject of the eyes.

original: de'i phyogs kyi chos la brten pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyogs kyi chos la brten pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not tenable that the property of the subject is the reason, therefore the reason is not the property of the subject.ğŸ”½Because the property of the subject is not the reason, therefore the reason is not the property of the subject.

original: tshul gcig pa nyid du bstan pa rnams ni tshul gnyis pa nyid du gdon mi za la /
analyzed: tshul gcig pa nyid du bstan pa rnams ni tshul gnyis pa nyid du gdon mi za la /
translated: But there is no doubt that those that are taught as having one mode are in fact of two modes.

original: tshul gnyis pa nyid du brjod pa rnams ni tshul gsum pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: tshul gnyis pa nyid du brjod pa rnams ni tshul gsum pa nyid yin te /
translated: And those that are expressed as having two modes are in fact of three modes.

original: phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba de nyid las te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba de nyid las te /
translated: This is because they are the property of the subject.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs mtshan nyid gcig pa can ni don med pa yin no ;
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs mtshan nyid gcig pa can ni don med pa yin no ;
translated: Therefore, it is pointless to have a definition of a reason that has only one mode.

original: / gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyis phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa 'phen pa yin te /
analyzed: / gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyis phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa 'phen pa yin te /
translated: Since it is untenable for it to be otherwise, the property of the subject and so on are projected.

original: de'i phyir de dag gi mtshan nyid rang dbang du logs shig tu med do zhes bya ba 'di yang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag gi mtshan nyid rang dbang du logs shig tu med do zhes bya ba 'di yang brjod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it should be said that their definitions are not independent and separate.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because,

original: sgra dang mar me sogs dngos la //
analyzed: sgra dang mar me sogs dngos la //
translated: in things such as sound and a lamp,

original: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyis //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyis //
translated: since it is untenable for it to be otherwise,

original: phyogs kyi chos ni med na yang //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos ni med na yang //
translated: even though the property of the subject does not exist,

original: shes par byed pa nyid du'ang mthong //
analyzed: shes par byed pa nyid du'ang mthong //
translated: it is seen to be the illuminator.

original: zhes phyogs kyi chos med par yang gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid yod par rang nyid kyis smras pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes phyogs kyi chos med par yang gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid yod par rang nyid kyis smras pa yin no //
translated: Thus BhÄviveka himself states that even though the property of the subject does not exist, it is untenable for it to be otherwise.

original: mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid las gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid yin na yang 'di la phyogs kyi chos med pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid las gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid yin na yang 'di la phyogs kyi chos med pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: If it is not tenable that the state of being the object of apprehension by the eye is different from impermanence, then because the property of the subject is not established, it is just indeterminate.ğŸ”½Also, someone says:

original: gang yang / de'i bu yin phyir de sngo bsangs //
analyzed: gang yang / de'i bu yin phyir de sngo bsangs //
translated: Because it is his son, it is blue.

original: snang ba'i sngo bsangs cig shos bzhin //
analyzed: snang ba'i sngo bsangs cig shos bzhin //
translated: Like the other blue of the color blue.

original: de ltar tshul gsum ldan na'ang 'di //
analyzed: de ltar tshul gsum ldan na'ang 'di //
translated: In that case, even though it has the three modes,

original: nges par 'jug pa ma yin no /
analyzed: nges par 'jug pa ma yin no /
translated: it does not definitely engage.

original: zhes bya ba 'di la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di la /
translated: In response to that, it is said:

original: de'i bu nyid sogs gtan tshigs la //
analyzed: de'i bu nyid sogs gtan tshigs la //
translated: In the case of â€œbecause it is his son,â€ etc.,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it is said:

original: de'i bu yang yin la sngo bsangs yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di la 'gal ba cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i bu yang yin la sngo bsangs yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di la 'gal ba cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there is not the slightest contradiction in saying â€œit is his son but it is not blue,â€

original: mi mthun pa'i phyir phyogs ldog pa la the tshom za ba 'di mtshan nyid gsum pa ma yin pa'i phyir dpe ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyir phyogs ldog pa la the tshom za ba 'di mtshan nyid gsum pa ma yin pa'i phyir dpe ma grub pa yin no //
translated: because of the incompatibility, there is doubt about the reversal of the position. This is not a three-characteristic reason, and so the example is not established.

original: 'di snyam du 'gal ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'gal ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: If you think that there is no contradiction,

original: gal te rgyu tha dad pa yin na yang 'bras bu tha dad par 'gyur na rgyu med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
analyzed: gal te rgyu tha dad pa yin na yang 'bras bu tha dad par 'gyur na rgyu med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that even if the cause is different, the effect would be different, then it would be causeless.

original: de ni de'i bu yin yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ni de'i bu yin yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In response to this, the root text states, â€œEven if he is his son . . . â€

original: dge ba la sogs pa'i las kyi khyad par dang / grang ba dang dro ba'i zas la sogs pa'i gnas skabs tha dad pa las gzhan du gyur pa ste dkar sham la @30b sogs pa nyid srid pa'i phyir 'gal ba ga las yin te /
analyzed: dge ba la sogs pa'i las kyi khyad par dang / grang ba dang dro ba'i zas la sogs pa'i gnas skabs tha dad pa las gzhan du gyur pa ste dkar sham la @30b sogs pa nyid srid pa'i phyir 'gal ba ga las yin te /
translated: Since it is possible that the son could be different from his father in terms of the specific virtuous and nonvirtuous actions he has performed and in terms of the different circumstances he has experienced, such as eating hot and cold food, how could there be a contradiction?

original: rgyu tha dad par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no contradiction because the cause is not established as being different.

original: gzhan yang de'i bu yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di byas pa nyid bzhin du rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de'i bu yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di byas pa nyid bzhin du rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, the phrase â€œbecause he is his sonâ€ is not a logical argument based on the nature of things, like the statement â€œbecause it is a product.â€

original: byas pa de ni mi rtag pa nyid spangs nas gzhan du med pa bzhin du de'i bu la rang bzhin gzhan med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: byas pa de ni mi rtag pa nyid spangs nas gzhan du med pa bzhin du de'i bu la rang bzhin gzhan med pa ma yin te /
translated: Just as the product does not exist apart from impermanence, the son does not have a nature that is different from his father.

original: 'di ltar 'bras bu nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'ga' zhig la ltos nas de'i bu zhes tha snyad du byas kyi sngo bsangs nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'bras bu nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'ga' zhig la ltos nas de'i bu zhes tha snyad du byas kyi sngo bsangs nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, in dependence on some effect, the five appropriated aggregates, the convention â€œsonâ€ is used, but not in dependence on blueness.

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it a reason based on effect,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the state of cause and effect is not established.

original: mi dmigs pa yang ma yin te ;
analyzed: mi dmigs pa yang ma yin te ;
translated: Nor is it non-apprehension,

original: grub pa yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because what is established is the domain.

original: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir sngo bsangs las gzhan pa'i kha dog med pa ma grub po //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir sngo bsangs las gzhan pa'i kha dog med pa ma grub po //
translated: Since there is no contradiction, it is not established that there is no color other than blue.

original: de dag las ma gtogs pa'i rtags kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag las ma gtogs pa'i rtags kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there a reason that is not included among those,

original: gzhan du 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no connection with anything else.

original: 'brel pa med par yang go bar byed pa ma yin te ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med par yang go bar byed pa ma yin te ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor does it make one understand when there is no connection, because that would be absurd.

original: de lta bas na 'di gtan tshigs ma yin la mtshan nyid gsum pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ga las 'khrul pa yin /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di gtan tshigs ma yin la mtshan nyid gsum pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ga las 'khrul pa yin /
translated: Therefore, since it is not a reason and it is not a third characteristic, how can it be mistaken?

original: snang ba ma mthong ba ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: snang ba ma mthong ba ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The non-seeing of appearances is the non-apprehension of the characteristic of the object.

original: 'on te ma 'khrul pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas mtshan nyid ma khyab pa'i skyon 'chad de /ğŸ”½dper na zla ba shar ba las ku mu ta kha bye ba dang rgya mtsho 'phel bar rjes su dpog pa dang / sogs pa smos pas nyi ma 'char ba las padma kha bye ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te ma 'khrul pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas mtshan nyid ma khyab pa'i skyon 'chad de / dper na zla ba shar ba las ku mu ta kha bye ba dang rgya mtsho 'phel bar rjes su dpog pa dang / sogs pa smos pas nyi ma 'char ba las padma kha bye ba'o //
translated: But if it is non-erroneous, etc., he explains the fault of the non-pervasion of the characteristic.ğŸ”½For example, from the rising of the moon, the opening of the kumuta flower and the swelling of the ocean are inferred, and from the rising of the sun, the opening of the lotus flower, etc., are inferred.

original: nyi ma shar ba las ri la sogs pa'i pha rol phyogs su grib ma rjes su dpog pa dang / de bzhin du mun par ring mo nas mag la du ma yog pa tshigs pa'i dum bu mthong nas du ba rtogs pa dang / de bzhin du rgyu skar smin drug shar ba la rgyu skar snar ma nye bar rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: nyi ma shar ba las ri la sogs pa'i pha rol phyogs su grib ma rjes su dpog pa dang / de bzhin du mun par ring mo nas mag la du ma yog pa tshigs pa'i dum bu mthong nas du ba rtogs pa dang / de bzhin du rgyu skar smin drug shar ba la rgyu skar snar ma nye bar rtogs par byed de /
translated: From the rising of the sun, the shadow on the mountain, etc., is inferred, and likewise, from seeing the tip of the bamboo in the darkness of the night, smoke is inferred. Likewise, from the rising of the constellation Pushya, the proximity of the constellation Ashlesha is inferred.

original: 'di ltar tha skar nas brtsams nas 'don pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyu skar rnam 'char ro zhes grags so //
analyzed: 'di ltar tha skar nas brtsams nas 'don pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyu skar rnam 'char ro zhes grags so //
translated: Thus, the order of the stars beginning with Ä€Å›leá¹£Ä is the order in which they rise.

original: 'di thams cad gtan tshigs gsum gyi khongs su ma 'dus pa'i phyir te /ğŸ”½ci'i phyir / de dag las ni ma gtogs pa //ğŸ”½'khrul pa med pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'di thams cad gtan tshigs gsum gyi khongs su ma 'dus pa'i phyir te / ci'i phyir / de dag las ni ma gtogs pa // 'khrul pa med pa yod ma yin //
translated: All of this is included in the three reasons.ğŸ”½Why is it said:

original: zhes ci ste rjod par byed ce na /
analyzed: zhes ci ste rjod par byed ce na /
translated: â€œApart from them, there is no non-erroneous [reason]â€?

original: 'dir lan bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir lan bshad pa ni /
translated: The answer is:

original: de phyir 'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /ğŸ”½rgyu gang gi phyir kha bye ba la sogs pa de dag ste ku @31a * //
analyzed: de phyir 'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / rgyu gang gi phyir kha bye ba la sogs pa de dag ste ku @31a * //
translated: Therefore, in this case, etc.ğŸ”½The reason is that the arising of those, such as the opening of the jasmine flower,

original: mu ta kha bye ba la sogs pa de dag byung ba ni skyes pa'o //
analyzed: mu ta kha bye ba la sogs pa de dag byung ba ni skyes pa'o //
translated: is the birth of those, such as the jasmine flower, when the moon rises.

original: ci lta bu'i khyad par can yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci lta bu'i khyad par can yin zhe na /
translated: What kind of special [reason]?

original: de dang dus gcig ste /
analyzed: de dang dus gcig ste /
translated: Simultaneous with that,

original: zla ba 'char ba dang nyi ma dang mgal du ma de dag dang dus gcig pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba 'char ba dang nyi ma dang mgal du ma de dag dang dus gcig pa'o //
translated: simultaneous with the rising of the moon, the sun and the firebrand.

original: rgyu'i chos de 'dra ba'i gtan tshigs kyis yul rjes su dpog par 'dod do //
analyzed: rgyu'i chos de 'dra ba'i gtan tshigs kyis yul rjes su dpog par 'dod do //
translated: By that kind of reason, the object is inferred.

original: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /ğŸ”½ku mu ta kha bye ba la sogs pa dang dus mnyam du skyes pa'i zla ba 'char ba la sogs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de kho na ku mu ta kha bye ba la sogs pa lhan cig byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te / ku mu ta kha bye ba la sogs pa dang dus mnyam du skyes pa'i zla ba 'char ba la sogs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de kho na ku mu ta kha bye ba la sogs pa lhan cig byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: This is the explanation:ğŸ”½Since the cause of the opening of the kumuta flower and so on, which arises simultaneously with the rising of the moon and so on, is the co-originating cause of the opening of the kumuta flower and so on,

original: zla ba 'char ba la sogs pa de dag de lta bur gyur pa'i rang gi rgyu rjes su dpog par byed pa na shugs kyis dus mnyam du 'byung ba'i ku mu ta kha bye ba la sogs pa yang rjes su dpog par byed kyi dngos su ni ma
analyzed: zla ba 'char ba la sogs pa de dag de lta bur gyur pa'i rang gi rgyu rjes su dpog par byed pa na shugs kyis dus mnyam du 'byung ba'i ku mu ta kha bye ba la sogs pa yang rjes su dpog par byed kyi dngos su ni ma
translated: when one infers the cause of the rising of the moon and so on, one infers the simultaneous arising of the opening of the kumuta flower and so on indirectly, but not directly.

original: yin pa'i phyir rnam pa de lta bu ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi khongs su 'dus pa yin no //
analyzed: yin pa'i phyir rnam pa de lta bu ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi khongs su 'dus pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this type of inference is included in the category of inference based on effect.

original: 'di ni gdon mi za bar de lta bu yin par rigs par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni gdon mi za bar de lta bu yin par rigs par bya ste /
translated: This must be understood in this way without doubt.

original: gal te 'brel pa med pas kyang de ltar go bar byed pa yin na de'i tshe gang ci yang rung ba go bar byed par 'gyur te 'brel ba med pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa med pas kyang de ltar go bar byed pa yin na de'i tshe gang ci yang rung ba go bar byed par 'gyur te 'brel ba med pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is argued that one understands that way even without a relation, then anything at all would be understood, because there would be no difference in the absence of a relation.

original: de lta bas na 'di la yang 'brel par brjod la /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di la yang 'brel par brjod la /
translated: Therefore, in this case, a relation is stated,

original: de yang ji skad du bshad pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: de yang ji skad du bshad pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid kho na'o //
translated: and that is just the characteristic of the relation of cause and effect as explained.

original: 'o na smin drug 'char ba snar ma nye ba dang 'brel ba ci yod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na smin drug 'char ba snar ma nye ba dang 'brel ba ci yod ce na /
translated: Now, what is the relation between the rising of the star Magha and the proximity of Ashlesha?

original: skar ma smin drug 'char ba'i rgyu //
analyzed: skar ma smin drug 'char ba'i rgyu //
translated: The cause of the rising of the star Magha

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so on is stated.

original: 'thor byed ni rlung ngo //
analyzed: 'thor byed ni rlung ngo //
translated: Scattering is wind.

original: 'dir yang tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pas dpog par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pas dpog par byed pa yin te /
translated: Here too, the causal dharma is inferred by inference based on dependence on the same collection,

original: ji skad du /ğŸ”½tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i //
analyzed: ji skad du / tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i //
translated: as it is said:ğŸ”½The taste of form and so on

original: gzugs la sogs pa ros rtogs so //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa ros rtogs so //
translated: is understood based on dependence on the same collection.

original: rgyu chos rjes su dpag pas te //
analyzed: rgyu chos rjes su dpag pas te //
translated: By inference of the causal dharma,

original: du bas bud shing 'gyur pa bzhin //ğŸ”½zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: du bas bud shing 'gyur pa bzhin // zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: like fuel is transformed by fire.

original: yang gzugs brnyan las gzugs rtogs pa gang yin pa de yang gang gi yang khongs sum 'dus te /
analyzed: yang gzugs brnyan las gzugs rtogs pa gang yin pa de yang gang gi yang khongs sum 'dus te /
translated: Moreover, the understanding of form from a reflection is not included in any of those,

original: gzugs brnyan ni dngos po med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½de lta bas na mtshan nyid ma khyab pa can yin no snyam du dogs pa la /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan ni dngos po med pa yin pa'i phyir ro // de lta bas na mtshan nyid ma khyab pa can yin no snyam du dogs pa la /
translated: because a reflection is a non-entity.ğŸ”½Therefore, the definition is not universally applicable.

original: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i rtags las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i rtags las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To anticipate this doubt, he says, â€œFrom the evidence called a reflection,â€ and so on.

original: gcig na lhan cig ces bya ba la sogs pas rtsod par byed pa'i bsam pa dogs par byed @31b pa yin te /
analyzed: gcig na lhan cig ces bya ba la sogs pas rtsod par byed pa'i bsam pa dogs par byed @31b pa yin te /
translated: The thought of the opponent is anticipated with â€œIf one is present, both are present,â€ and so on.

original: gtan tshigs dngos po med pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs dngos po med pa nyid yin te /
translated: The reason is that it is a non-entity,

original: gcig na lhan cig gnyis yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gcig na lhan cig gnyis yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because if one is present, both are present.

original: phyogs gang kho nar me long gi gzugs mthong ba de kho nar gzugs brnyan yang yin te /
analyzed: phyogs gang kho nar me long gi gzugs mthong ba de kho nar gzugs brnyan yang yin te /
translated: In whatever place the form of the mirror is seen, there the reflection is also.

original: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu gzugs gnyis lhan cig 'byung ba'i yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu gzugs gnyis lhan cig 'byung ba'i yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And because it is obstructed, two forms do not exist together in one place.

original: de'i phyir dngos po nyid yin na gcig na gzugs gnyis lhan cig yod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po nyid yin na gcig na gzugs gnyis lhan cig yod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, if it were a real entity, two forms would not exist together in one place. But they do exist together.

original: de bas na 'di ni 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is a delusion.

original: rnam pa gcig tu na /
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu na /
translated: In one sense,

original: gcig na lhan cig gnyis yod phyir //
analyzed: gcig na lhan cig gnyis yod phyir //
translated: the two exist together in one place.

original: zhes bya ba la gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two?

original: me long gi ngos dang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan no //ğŸ”½me long gi ngos ni yul gzhan kho na yin la /
analyzed: me long gi ngos dang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan no // me long gi ngos ni yul gzhan kho na yin la /
translated: The surface of a mirror and the reflection of the moon.

original: nang na gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs brnyan ni gzhan kho nar mthong ste /
analyzed: nang na gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs brnyan ni gzhan kho nar mthong ste /
translated: The surface of the mirror is in one place, and the reflection of the moon, which is located inside, is seen in another place.

original: khron pa'i chu bzhin no //
analyzed: khron pa'i chu bzhin no //
translated: It is like the water in a well.

original: der skyes pa yang ci'i phyir gzhan du dmigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: der skyes pa yang ci'i phyir gzhan du dmigs par 'gyur te /
translated: Why is it that what is produced there is perceived in another place?

original: de'i phyir gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba dngos por gyur pa cung zad kyang med la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba dngos por gyur pa cung zad kyang med la /
translated: Therefore, a reflection is not a real entity at all.

original: chos rnams kyi nus pa'i bye brag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi nus pa'i bye brag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the specific potencies of things are inconceivable.

original: gang zhig de ltar mthong ba de ni tshogs pa de'i mthu de 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig de ltar mthong ba de ni tshogs pa de'i mthu de 'dra ba yin no //
translated: One who sees it in this way sees the power of that assemblage to be just like that.

original: gal te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed de /
analyzed: gal te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed de /
translated: He replies to the objection that is stated in the passage beginning with â€œBut ifâ€ and so on.

original: 'dir shes pa nyid de lta bur gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i rtags su mngon par 'dod kyi /
analyzed: 'dir shes pa nyid de lta bur gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i rtags su mngon par 'dod kyi /

analyzed: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i phyi'i dngos po ni ma yin no //

analyzed: yang tshul gsum pa'i rtags brjod pa gzhan gyi don yin no //
translated: Moreover, the statement of the evidence having the three modes is for the sake of others.

original: ji ltar brjod par byed /
analyzed: ji ltar brjod par byed /

analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan dag gis phyogs dang nye bar sbyor ba dang mjug bsdu ba yang gzhan gyi rjes su dpag par bsgrub pa yin no //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs te /

analyzed: de'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i rgyu ste de bkag pa ni sgrub byed yan lag tu ma gyur pa'o //

analyzed: de lta bas na sgrub par byed pa yan lag tu ma gyur pa'i phyir nye bar sbyor ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, because it is not a part of the proof, it is not applied.

original: sbyar bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //ğŸ”½de lta ma yin te sbyor @32a * //
analyzed: sbyar bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // de lta ma yin te sbyor @32a * //

original: ba min pa rgyur gyur pa ma yin par 'chad na dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs kyis gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba min pa rgyur gyur pa ma yin par 'chad na dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs kyis gcig tu 'gyur ro //

analyzed: ji ltar sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin zhe na /

original: 'brel pa med phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'brel pa med phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

analyzed: nus pa med pa ston pa ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The statement â€œbecause there is no capacityâ€ is made because the object of the thesis is stated.

original: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /

original: sgra rnams don dang lhan cig 'brel pa med pa'i phyir re zhig dngos su sbyor ba ma yin la /
analyzed: sgra rnams don dang lhan cig 'brel pa med pa'i phyir re zhig dngos su sbyor ba ma yin la /

analyzed: gtan tshigs brjod pa bzhin du nus pa ston pa'i phyir brgyud pas kyang ma yin te /

analyzed: ji skad du / phyogs kyi tshig de smra ba yis //

analyzed: bsam pa rig par byed pa la //
translated: uses words that express a position,ğŸ”½because doubt arises from that valid cognition,

original: tshad ma de las the tshom dag / skye phyir rjes su sgrub byed min //
analyzed: tshad ma de las the tshom dag / skye phyir rjes su sgrub byed min //
translated: it is not a proof.

original: bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa yis //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa yis //

original: brgyud pa yis kyang nus pa med //
analyzed: brgyud pa yis kyang nus pa med //
translated: is not capable of proving anything, even indirectly.

original: ces bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ces bshad pa bzhin no //

original: kha cig yan lag tu ma gyur kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa'i chos dag gis yul nye bar bstan pa'i don du dpe brjod pa bzhin du dam bca' ba rab tu sbyar ba yin te /
analyzed: kha cig yan lag tu ma gyur kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa'i chos dag gis yul nye bar bstan pa'i don du dpe brjod pa bzhin du dam bca' ba rab tu sbyar ba yin te /
translated: Some say: Even though it is not a part of a proof, the thesis is applied in order to indicate the object that is the property to be established and the property that establishes it, just as an example is stated in order to indicate the object.ğŸ”½As it is said:

original: gang phyir lhag ma tshul gnyis po //
analyzed: gang phyir lhag ma tshul gnyis po //
translated: Because the two modes of the remainder

analyzed: dpe yis bstan par bya ba yin //ğŸ”½zhes bshad pa'i phyir /

original: dpe'i tshig logs shig tu yan lag tu gyur pa ma yin yang phyogs kyi chos ma gtogs pa lhag ma tshul gnyis bstan par bya ba'i don du sbyar bar bya ba yin no snyam du sems pa de dag la /

analyzed: ji ltar dpe'i tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: lung bsgo ba ni /
analyzed: lung bsgo ba ni /

analyzed: 'di ltar gyis shig / sgra mi rtag pa sgrubs shig pa'o //

analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras gzhan gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig gzung ngo //

analyzed: de lta bur gyur ba'i tshig kyang sbyor ba bstan pa'i don du bstan par bya bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'di ltar gang dang gang byas pa yin pa de thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin la /

analyzed: 'on ji ltar mthun pa'i phyogs la sogs pa rnam par 'jog ste /

original: 'di ltar mthun pa'i phyogs ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi don @32b mthun pa'o zhes bya ba dang / shugs kyis de med pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs brjod de /

analyzed: sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed do //

analyzed: gnag rdzi la sogs pa mthun pa'i phyogs la sogs pa'i tha snyad la mi mkhas pa rnams kyang /
translated: Even those who are not skilled in the conventions of â€œsimilar classâ€ and so on, such as cowherds,

original: gang na du ba yod pa de na med yod la 'di na yang du ba yod pas zhes bya ba de tsam zhig brjod pa na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa bzung ste /
analyzed: gang na du ba yod pa de na med yod la 'di na yang du ba yod pas zhes bya ba de tsam zhig brjod pa na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa bzung ste /

analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la sogs pa'i tha snyad med par yang me rtog pa kho na'o //

original: de lta bas na sgrub par byed pa'i dus na mthun pa'i phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na sgrub par byed pa'i dus na mthun pa'i phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, when the proof is stated, the classification of â€œsimilar classâ€ and so on does not exist.

analyzed: 'o na mthun pa'i phyogs la sogs pa'i tha snyad gang na yod ce na /

original: bstan bcos zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bstan bcos zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says â€œin treatises.â€ğŸ”½Or, even when the proof is stated, there is no contradiction in positing those.

original: yang na sgrub par byed pa brjod pa'i dus na yang de'i rnam par gzhag pa byed pa 'gal ba med pa yin no zhes ston pa ni yang na skabs kyi don zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

translated: To show this, he says â€œOr, in the context of the meaningâ€ and so on.

analyzed: gal te yang sgrub par byed pa brjod pa'i dus na dam bca' ba sbyor ba med pa de lta na yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la brten nas skabs su bab pa'i don bsgrub bya rnam par 'jog pa mi 'gal ba nyid do //
translated: Even if the thesis is not stated at the time of the proof, it is not contradictory for the probandum to be posited in dependence on the subject that is the basis of the probandum.

analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i dus na skabs su bab pa nyid kyi don yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: It cannot be said that the meaning of the probandum does not exist at the time of the proof.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi sde dam bca' ba sbyor bar smra ba rnams kyis rgol bas sgrub par byed pa skabs min te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi sde dam bca' ba sbyor bar smra ba rnams kyis rgol bas sgrub par byed pa skabs min te /
translated: This is because the other party, who advocates that the thesis is stated at the time of the proof, argues that the proof is not the occasion for the thesis.

analyzed: skabs su ma bab pa nyid smra ba ma yin no //

analyzed: shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i chos can skabs su bab pa yin te /

analyzed: de lta na yang skabs su bab pa'i chos can la brten nas rnam par gzhag pa de byed pa na ji ltar bya ba yin zhe na /

original: shes par 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba smos te go bar zad do //
analyzed: shes par 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba smos te go bar zad do //
translated: â€œThe one who wishes to knowâ€ is self-evident.

original: dper brjod pa la ltos nas de ltar zhes nye bar sdud pa'am de lta ma yin no zhes bsgrub par bya ba nye bar sbyor ba ni nye bar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dper brjod pa la ltos nas de ltar zhes nye bar sdud pa'am de lta ma yin no zhes bsgrub par bya ba nye bar sbyor ba ni nye bar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: â€œThusâ€ is a summary statement based on an example, or it is the application of the probandum, â€œIt is not so.â€ This is the definition of a summary statement.

analyzed: de la slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas kyi nye bar sbyor ba brjod pa ni sgrub par byed pa ma @33a * //
translated: In this regard, the master DignÄgaâ€™s statement, â€œIt is not a proof,â€

original: yin no // brjod zin pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don gsal bar byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yin no // brjod zin pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don gsal bar byed pa'i phyir /
translated: is a clarification of the meaning of the reason that has already been stated.

original: gtan tshigs brjod pa gnyis pa bzhin no zhes tshad ma mdzad pa la /
analyzed: gtan tshigs brjod pa gnyis pa bzhin no zhes tshad ma mdzad pa la /

original: dngos po rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa dag gtan tshigs ma grub par bya ba'i don du dam bca' pa'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba gtan tshigs brjod pas phyogs kyi chos nyid gsal bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa dag gtan tshigs ma grub par bya ba'i don du dam bca' pa'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba gtan tshigs brjod pas phyogs kyi chos nyid gsal bar byed pa yin te /
translated: In this regard, the statements of DignÄga, â€œThe differentiation of things,â€ and so on, occur after the conclusion of the thesis in order to prove that the reason is not established. The statement of the reason clarifies the property of the subject.

original: rgyu tsam brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu tsam brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it states only the reason.

original: sgra mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: Sound is impermanent,

original: byas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: byas pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it is produced.

original: byas pa nyid de yang ci sgra la yod dam med snyam pa la /
analyzed: byas pa nyid de yang ci sgra la yod dam med snyam pa la /
translated: But is this production present in sound or not?

original: de yod pa nyid du nye bar sbyor ba las rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: de yod pa nyid du nye bar sbyor ba las rtog pa yin no //
translated: It is present, and the idea is formed from the application of that.

original: yang na gzugs brnyan gyi don du nye bar sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: yang na gzugs brnyan gyi don du nye bar sbyor ba yin te /
translated: Or else, the application is for the sake of a reflection.

original: thog mar gtan tshigs brjod pas bya ba nyid khyad par med par sgra la bstan la dpe la bstan pa'i byas pa de bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba nyid ni nye bar sbyor bas bzlas pa yin no //
analyzed: thog mar gtan tshigs brjod pas bya ba nyid khyad par med par sgra la bstan la dpe la bstan pa'i byas pa de bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba nyid ni nye bar sbyor bas bzlas pa yin no //
translated: First, by stating the reason, production is shown in sound without distinction. The production shown in the example is shown to be a necessary concomitant of the probandum by the application.

analyzed: de bzhin du sgra la yang byas pa nyid yin no zhes bya bas 'dra bar bstan pa yin no ;
translated: Similarly, in sound, it is shown to be similar by the statement, â€œIt is produced.â€

original: / de lta bas na khyad par bsal bar bya ba'i phyir zlos pa ma yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: / de lta bas na khyad par bsal bar bya ba'i phyir zlos pa ma yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Therefore, it is not a repetition, because it clarifies the distinction.

original: 'dir bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa ni /

original: dam bca' brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dam bca' brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The statement of the thesis, etc.

original: yod pa bsgrub par bya don du //
analyzed: yod pa bsgrub par bya don du //
translated: For the sake of proving existence,

original: zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i chos can la zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i chos can la zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: The reason is that the subject of the probandum is not stated.

original: 'di la don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di la don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis dam bca' ba'i sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis dam bca' ba'i sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir /

original: de'i de ma thag tu 'byung ba'i byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan brjod pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i de ma thag tu 'byung ba'i byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan brjod pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: immediately after that, the reason, such as â€œbecause it is produced,â€ is not stated at all.

original: de bas na rgyu mtshan brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi nye bar sbyar ba brjod par mi bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na rgyu mtshan brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi nye bar sbyar ba brjod par mi bya ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the statement of the application must be preceded by the statement of the reason.

original: yang phyogs kyi chos gsal bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar sbyar brjod par byed pa de'i tshe rgyu mtshan brjod pa'i 'bras bu gzhan brjod par bya dgos so //
analyzed: yang phyogs kyi chos gsal bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar sbyar brjod par byed pa de'i tshe rgyu mtshan brjod pa'i 'bras bu gzhan brjod par bya dgos so //
translated: Moreover, when the application is stated in order to clarify the property of the subject, then the result, the statement of the other, the reason, must be stated.

original: de la 'di snyam du rgyu mtshan nyid du rtogs pa 'bras bu yin no snyam du sems na /
analyzed: de la 'di snyam du rgyu mtshan nyid du rtogs pa 'bras bu yin no snyam du sems na /
translated: If, in this regard, you think that the result is the understanding of the reason itself,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: re zhig de nyid rtogs pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: re zhig de nyid rtogs pas ci zhig bya /
